result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy E Kuhn

records.addlTxt:
10:44 AM Defendant Jeremy E Kuhn in court.  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Jeremy E Kuhn. Attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk.   On count 1 in 21CT06 - def- G plea. On count 1 in 21CM158 misd battery- def- G plea. CT accepts pleas on each count, adj G. Counts 2,3,4 in 21CT06 are RI&D. Counts 2, 3 in 21CM158 and 22CM08 are RI&D on state's motion. Arguments. Def makes statement. 

SENTENCE: 
21CT06: 10 days jail. $1,229.00 fine/costs, $200 DNA surcharge, DNA sample. AODA and comply. 12 months revoked DL, 12 months IID.  Must report to jail on or before 6/10/22 by 6:00 pm. Subj to WR and GT. Must serve first 48 hours without WR. 2 days credit.

21CM158: W/held 1 year probation. Must report to probation today. AODA and comply. Any other treatment/programming required by agent. $265.60 fine/costs, $200 DNA surcharge and sample. 60 dtp or set up PP with COCC. 2 days credit.  11:00 am adj.

CASES: 21CM158, 21CT06, 22CM08. 10:06 AM  Defendant Jeremy E Kuhn in court with attorney Donna Burger.  David Stilin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. Resolved. Bond cont. 10:08 am adj.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: BOND COVERS 21CM158, 22CM08, 21CT06. Not to have abusive contact with: JBK.   Not to possess or use drugs without a prescription. Not to possess drug paraphernalia. Not to possess or consume alcohol.  Absolute Sobriety. Follow any mental health regimen. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

ADDRESS INFO for Jeremy E Kuhn
Current: E6796 871st Ave, Colfax, WI 54730 United States  (Effective: 01-14-2022)
Prior: 117 South Ave E, Clear Lake, WI 54005

CASES: 21CM158, 22CM08, 21CT06. 01:23 PM Defendant Jeremy E Kuhn appeared by video means from PCJ, in custody. Attorney Donna Burger in court. Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp appeared for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. Return on warrant in 21CT06, Return on warrant/Init Appr 21CM158, Initial Appr 22CM08. RL-clerk. Qualifies. 
21CM158 and 22CM08: Qualifies. Waives reading. NG pleas. Def updates his address. DA requests $250 cash on two new files. CT sets bond to cover all 3 files. 1:30 pm adj.  Status conference scheduled for March 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
